document.full_text: while many world leaders applauded the u.s. operation that killed al qaeda leader osama bin laden, there were concerns in parts of europe that the united states was wrong to act as policeman, judge and executioner.
document.title: should bin laden have been captured and tried?
lines_and_colors: while many world leaders applauded the u.s. operation that killed al qaeda leader osama bin laden, there were concerns in parts of europe that the united states was wrong to act as policeman, judge and executioner.
